ygData.subject: Re: Studs and Bonding
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI however, I started making banded armor before I made boning (hehe not on purpose though lol) and I was able to successfully make banded gorgets at skill 68
ygData.messageBody:
FYI however, I started making banded armor before I made boning (hehe not
on purpose though lol) and I was able to successfully make banded gorgets
at skill 68 and they sell for 5 pl a piece going rate. Just something to
keep in mind as I'm not sure how much boning sells for or what skill level
it takes. I THOUGHT I would have
had to increase my skills making boning before I was able to make banded
but I took a shot at banded at level 68 and succeeded immediately 50-75% of
the time. Just food for thought. ;) Not to mention though silly little
bricks cost quite a bit ...6 gold some odd s and some odd c. ;/

Twilite
